Message:
“There are countless replacements
for every shadow, are there not?”

It suddenly felt as if someone
whispered such words into mine ear.

My life doth far outweigh
that of any shadow.

To Asahi, I am the Princess.
Nothing more, nothing less.

The news of Asahi’s death
had reached mine ears.

After she and an assassin
struck each other down,
Asahi then...

My other servants led me
from my chamber to see
Asahi’s lifeless body,

yet I was unable to
even lay a finger on it.

That day marked the first time
I had ever wept for a shadow.
